extendedInfo.description: The world's most active marketplace for political and current affairs cartoons in your pocket. It's a constantly updating selection of news-related cartoons to explore and share. All by the world's top cartoonists.Browse trending topics or search on pretty much any major news item to find the right cartoon to spark discussion or make a political point.When you find a great cartoon, add it to your bookmarked collection or share the joy quickly and easily across your favorite social networks, by text or by email.You can even click through to CartoonStock.com to buy custom gifts or download high res. files for use in teaching, presentations and publishing.

reviews.title: Cool app, but could be better
reviews.comment: Very easy to use. The search by topic feature works great. I wish you could save images directly to phone instead of having to email a link to yourself and save it on a computer. Also, many comics are hard to read because they are small and there is no zoom.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Please add zoom or adjust font size, then would be 5 * app!
reviews.author: Denny Antrim
